general_advisory: Farmers are advised to irrigate their fields as there is a mild dry condition prevailing. Different crops require specific treatments to manage diseases and pests. Specific advice is provided for each crop mentioned in the advisory.

advisory: Now there are chances of Aphid and Painted Bug infestation in mustard crop. Spray Neem Based Pesticide (Azadirachtin) 1500 PPM to manage primary infestation.
To manage stem rot in groundnut, drench soil with Validamycin 3% L at recommended rate.
Cotton crop picking is almost completed.
For ratooning in sugarcane, green manure crops like Dhaincha, Sunhemp, and Cowpea can be grown between two rows.
To manage stem borer in paddy, use Trichogrammajaponicum card at weekly intervals. Apply recommended insecticides for effective pest control.
In onion crop, go for interculture and hand weeding at recommended intervals. Apply fertilizers as per recommendations.
To manage powdery mildew disease in Blackgram and Greengram crop, spray recommended fungicides at specified rates.
To manage early blight and late blight in potatoes, spray recommended fungicides at specified intervals.
Present weather condition is favorable for infestation of Diamond Back Moth and Head Borer in late sown Cauliflower and Cabbage crops. Take necessary control measures as advised.
Prevailing fog condition may increase Aphid infestation in tomatoes. Control measures with recommended sprays.
To manage Epilachna Beetle in brinjal plants, follow the recommended management practices.
To control thrips in rose, spray recommended insecticides as specified.
